price: sesungguhnya kamu telah membenarkan mimpi itu 1285 sesungguhnya demikianlah Kami memberi balasan kepada orang-orang yang berbuat baik.
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
footnotes: 1285.  Maksud "membenarkan mimpi" ialah mempercayai bahwa mimpi itu benar dari Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā dan wajib melaksanakannya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
